content.p: You can access a number of Internal funding streams to support translation of research outputs and the exchange of knowledge between the university and the wider economy. Support mechanisms include secondments to industry and proof of concept funding to further develop new ideas arising from research carried out at the institution. Awards range from travel grants of up to £3,000 to translational research awards up to £100,000. The different funding streams include: Full information on funding streams and how to apply can be found on the Knowledge Exchange Hub (SharePoint site only accessible by UoN colleagues). The Ingenuity Centre University of Nottingham Innovation Park Triumph Road Nottingham, NG7 2TU telephone: +44 (0) 115 823 2180 fax: +44 (0) 115 823 2181 email: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk
